songs.title: Purple Rain*
songs.lyrics:
Lyrics From Snippet

[Chorus: Ice Cube]
...gang 
Like  a chain more, this is purple rain
Young whippersnapper, hit you with my fucking aim...

[Verse: Kendrick Lamar]
...you youth listening side off, so hope
I  take chances, you throw tantrums
I  drop hits, you drop soap
And you plant it, I'm romantic
Advances,  get checked on...
